What is climbable, hikeable and skiable? CopenHill!
By grouping a waste-to-energy power plant with a 90 metre high rooftop dry ski slope, a hiking trail and Europe‚Äôs tallest climbing wall on 85 meters, BIG and Amager Ressource Center have created a building fitting for a sci-fi movie, and urban recreational playground, setting the tone for sustainable city development.
